Flask Module Structured Frameworkïƒ

â˜¯ï¸ flask_mod_struct is framework for Flask web apps.

Developed in ğŸ python code.

The README is used to introduce the modules and provide instructions on how to install the modules, any machine dependencies it may have and any other information that should be provided before the modules are installed.

Contents

  • Flask Module Structured Framework

Installationïƒ

Navigate to release page download and extract release archive ğŸ“¦.

To install flask_mod_struct ğŸ“¦ type the following

tar xvzf flask_mod_struct-x.y.z.tar.gz
cd flask_mod_struct-x.y.z/
pip install -r requirements.txt
cp manage.py /FlaskApp/
cp -R /manage_commands/ /FlaskApp/
cp -R /app_server/ /Flask/

You can use Docker to create image/container ğŸš¢.

Dependenciesïƒ

flask_mod_struct requires next modules and libraries

alembic 1.6.5 Flask 1.1.4 Flask-Bcrypt 1.0.1 Flask-Bootstrap 3.3.7.1 Flask-Cors 3.0.10 Flask-DebugToolbar 0.13.1 Flask-Login 0.5.0 Flask-Mail 0.9.1 Flask-Migrate 2.6.0 Flask-Script 2.0.6 Flask-SQLAlchemy 2.5.1 Flask-Testing 0.8.1 Flask-WTF 0.14.3 SQLAlchemy 1.4.27 Werkzeug 1.0.1 WTForms 2.3.3

flask_mod_struct is based on OOP
